Package org.dicom4j.io

Classes to Read/Write DICOM data from stream

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BinaryInputStream Extends FilterInputStream by adding the concept of little and big endian binary value encoding.
BinaryOutputStream Extends FilterOutputStream by adding the concept of little and big endian binary value encoding.
CommandSetReader a specialized DicomReader to read a CommandSet stored in a stream
DicomInputStream Extends BinaryInputStream to add dicom specific read primitives
DicomOutputStream Extends BinaryOutputStream by adding the concept of transfer syntaxes
DicomReader Class to read a DataSet from a stream or bytes
DicomWriter Writer used to insert a DataSet into a stream.
EncapsulatedInputStream A class that extends InputStream by adding a mechanism for unecapsulating an undefined length DICOM attribute, such as is used for compressed Pixel Data.
 

Exception Summary
DicomIOException DICOM IO Exception
 

Package org.dicom4j.io Description

Classes to Read/Write DICOM data from stream
